name: Trials of Dice
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2022 Submission

Trials of Dice is a Rougelike Strategy game where each Room is randomly generated. This game has no end - it will continue until you are defeated.

In Trials of Dice you control the white dice, against an opponent who controls the black dice. When a dice is moved, it rolls to reveal a new face pointing upward. When 2 opposing dice land on the same square they will "battle". The dice with the greatest face value wins. (You win all ties, go you!)

Controls: 
 - Left Click to Select a dice
 - Left Click on a tile adjacent to a selected dice to move the dice 
 - Holding shift will let you see the layout of any dice you hover over (this also lets you see the enemy dice)

Thanks For Playing!
